title: Need Clear Statement on Files to Upload

content.raw:
There is a great deal of confusion on what should be uploaded for scoring. The tutorials indicate one thing but a email that I got in early November about my acceptance indicates something else. This has been discussion in the NS forum but without any clarity. 

Is uploading these files correct:

src_qual1_2017-01-13T16:21:12.948851.log
qual_1.log.gz
qual_2.log.gz

If not, please provide clear examples of the expected files and their names to eliminate the confusion once and for all.
